text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1971. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== *20 February - Camilla Bendix, actress *12 April - Tomas Villum Jensen, actor *30 April - Louise Mieritz, actress *6 July - Mia Lyhne, actress *28 September - Mads Vangsø, comedian & TV & radio host *12 November - Annette Heick, singer, cartoon voice actress, journalist & TV host ==Deaths== ==See also== *1971 in Denmark
title: 1971 in Danish television
